name: Kershaw Scallion Knife
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: Not too big, and not too small, the Scallion is an EDC-friendly pocket knife is just the right size.Designed by knife industry legend Ken Onion.420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.SpeedSafe® assisted opening mechanism and flipper tab makes deployment easy.Flipper tab doubles as a guard when the knife is open.Stainless steel frame-lock design effectively gives a folding knife full-tang rigidity.Sliding tip-lock keeps the blade locked closed until you need it.Jimping on the flipper tab and back of the blade for a secure grip.Pocket clip is designed for right handed tip-down carry.Lanyard hole.
